version_description: New in-app purchase – race to the top of the world with new locations, new trucks, and new tracks!
New ‘Velocityville’ in-app purchase – Blaze and his friends have transformed into race cars! Zoom through 15 new tracks and learn about velocity!
Happy Holidays racing fans!  Enjoy a FREE holiday cheer-filled update with 15 decorated tracks featuring Blaze, Crusher, and Starla in their holiday best!
New ‘Light Riders’ in-app purchase with Pickle – Race through 15 new glow-in-the-dark tracks, and learn about reflection!
Thank you for choosing Blaze and The Monster Machines App! Nick Jr. is dedicated to make our app better for you. This update includes new features such as new languages as well as build improvements.
